targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  valves_maint_time,
  hyd_oil_unit_maint_time, 
  hyd_oil_plant_maint_time,
  blower_maint_time,
  skip_maint_time,
  limestone_hopper_time,
  other_maint_time
FROM ${data_table} 
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND cycle_id = ${cycle}

list.description: Select the endpoint representing the data source from which data will be retrieved.
list.label: Endpoint
list.name: endpoint
endpoint_id

list.description: Select the correct tag table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard variables.
list.label: Tag Table
list.name: tag_table

list.definition:
SELECT process_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'
list.description: Select the correct data table associated with the chosen endpoint that contains the dashboard data.
list.label: Table
list.name: data_table
list.query:
SELECT process_table
FROM config.tag_tables
WHERE name = '${tag_table}'

list.definition:
SELECT 'Last' AS id

UNION ALL

SELECT CY::text AS id
FROM ${data_table} 
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY id DESC
list.description: Select the cycle id - Last autoupdates automatially to last id in the selected period
list.label: Cycle ID
list.name: cycle_select
list.query:
SELECT 'Last' AS id

UNION ALL

SELECT CY::text AS id
FROM ${data_table} 
WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id} 
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at) 
ORDER BY id DESC

list.definition:
WITH cycle_text AS (
    SELECT
        CASE
            WHEN lower('${cycle_select}') = 'last'
            THEN (
                SELECT CY::text
                FROM ${data_table}
                WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
                  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
                ORDER BY created_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            )
            ELSE '${cycle_select}'
        END AS cycle_id_text
)
SELECT cycle_id_text::integer AS selected_cycle_id
FROM cycle_text;
list.label: Cycle ID
list.name: cycle_id
list.query:
WITH cycle_text AS (
    SELECT
        CASE
            WHEN lower('${cycle_select}') = 'last'
            THEN (
                SELECT CY::text
                FROM ${data_table}
                WHERE endpoint = ${endpoint_id}
                  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
                ORDER BY created_at DESC
                LIMIT 1
            )
            ELSE '${cycle_select}'
        END AS cycle_id_text
)
SELECT cycle_id_text::integer AS selected_cycle_id
FROM cycle_text;
